name: search_news_articles
description: Search through millions of articles from over 150,000 large and small news sources and blogs using the NewsAPI.

page.description: The page number to retrieve results from. Default is 1.

pageSize.description: The number of results to return per page. Default is 10.

sortBy.description: The order to sort the articles in. Options: relevancy, popularity, publishedAt.

from_date.description: The date filter for the content, format: 'YYYY-MM-DD'. Optional, up to a month old.

to_date.description: The date filter for the content, format: 'YYYY-MM-DD'. Optional.

lang.description: The 2-letter ISO-639-1 code of the language you want to get headlines for. Optional.
